short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to streamline warm intros from the Hermes app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a companion extension for the Hermes Warm Intro's website for usage on visiting profiles on LinkedIn. 

This extension streamlines the warm intro process for a given Hermes user by prompting them to send a prefilled message to a LinkedIn connection for a relevant role. 

This extension is not currently meant to be a standalone extension, and is only relevant (at the moment) for users of the Hermes Warm Intro's site.
